T02D1193:15a-33: dam tshig sems dpa' chen po snying po dgyes pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1193:15a-34: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las he ru ka bzhi byung ba ste /
T02D1193:15a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1193:15a-37: dngos su dbu gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1193:15a-38: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni snang ba
T02D1193:15a-39: mtha' yas te gsung gi bdag nyid pas phyag bzhi
T02D1193:15a-40: pa'o // dam tshig sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi bdag nyid de /
T02D1193:15a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' ste dbu gsum phyag drug pa'o //
T02D1193:15b-0: snying po dgyes pa ni dgyes @15b ba'i rdo rje nyid de /
T02D1193:15b-1: dbu brgyad pa phyag bcu drug pa'o //
T02D1193:15b-2: de lta bu'i don bshad kyis nyon cig pa'i don to //
T02D1193:15b-3: mi phyed pas na rdo rjer bshad //
T02D1193:15b-6: sku gsung thugs mi phyed pa'am //
T02D1193:15b-7: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa la bya'o //
T02D1193:15b-8: sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig ces pa ni /
T02D1193:15b-9: sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'o //
T02D1193:15b-10: srid pa gsum ni khams gsum mo //
T02D1193:15b-11: de ltar khams gsum nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid du shes te /
T02D1193:15b-12: gcig pa nyid ni de dag gi ngo bo rang bzhin med par shes pa'o //
T02D1193:15b-13: shes rab 'di yi sbyor bas na ;
T02D1193:15b-15: de lta bu'i shes rab kyis chos nyid du sbyor ba ste /
T02D1193:15b-16: de nyid la rdo rje sems dpar sbyar te /
T02D1193:15b-17: gong ma'i sku'i bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D1193:15b-18: ye shes chen po'i ro rdzogs pa //
T02D1193:15b-20: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lhun gyis grub pas na /
T02D1193:15b-21: ro rdzogs pa zhes bshad do //
T02D1193:15b-22: rnam pa gcig tu na dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i ye
T02D1193:15b-23: shes kyi bde ba chen po'i ro bstar zhing rdzogs
T02D1193:15b-25: snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag nyid phyag bzhi pa
T02D1193:15b-26: dang sbyar te de nyid ni sems dpa' che zhes
T02D1193:15b-27: bshad do // rtag tu dam tshig bsnyen pa ni //
T02D1193:15b-29: dam tshig ni bza' ba dang btung ba'i dam tshig la bya na /
T02D1193:15b-30: 'dir shes rab dam tshig gi bdag nyid la bsnyen par 'dren te /
T02D1193:15b-31: dngos su rdo rje sems dpa' ste dbu gsum phyag drug pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D1193:15b-32: de la ni dam tshig sems dpar rab tu brjod ces bya'o //
T02D1193:15b-33: snying rje chen po dgyes pa ste /
T02D1193:15b-34: rdo rje shes rab dag tu bshad //
T02D1193:15b-36: snying rje ni thams cad la khyab pa la bya na /
T02D1193:15b-37: snying rje dgyes pa'i thabs te yab dang sbyar la /
T02D1193:15b-38: de nyid bde ba chen po'i dgyes pa dang ldan zhes bya'o //
T02D1193:15b-39: rdo rje shes rab tu bstan pa ni yum dang sbyar te yum shes rab la bya ste /
T02D1193:15b-40: dngos su thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud ces bya'o //
T02D1193:15b-41: de lta bu'i thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel pa'i rgyu dang yis bshad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:15b-42: ci ste ta tva sam gra ha la sogs pa shes rab kyi rgyud ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D1193:15b-43: 'on te de rnams la ni thabs kyi shas che la /
T02D1193:15b-44: shes rab kyi shas chung bar ston la /
T02D1193:16a-1: ni thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'i rgyud yin pas /
T02D1193:16a-2: de thabs khyad par du che bas na /
T02D1193:16a-3: shes rab thabs dag bdag nyid rgyud //
T02D1193:16a-4: nga yis bshad kyis nyan par gyis //
T02D1193:16a-6: mthong ba 'gugs shing brda chen dang //
T02D1193:16a-7: mkhas pa'i mthu ni du ma byed //
T02D1193:16a-8: ces pa la mthong ba ni 'og nas mnan pa dang /
T02D1193:16a-11: dgug pa ni bgegs dang bar du gcod pa dag
T02D1193:16a-12: go / brda ni 'og nas 'byung ba dag go
T02D1193:16a-13: // mkhas pa ni bya ba dngos grub brgyad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1193:16a-14: ye shes rnam shes mthu dag ni //
T02D1193:16a-15: lha mo rnams las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1193:16a-16: zhes bya ba la dngos su bdag med pa'i rnal
T02D1193:16a-17: 'byor ma dang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen
T02D1193:16a-18: po las / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grub ste /
T02D1193:16a-19: sangs rgyas kyi sgyu 'phrul dang mthu rnams thob ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:16a-20: de bas thog mar rgyu gcig pu //
T02D1193:16a-21: he ru ka ni skyed byed yin //
T02D1193:16a-23: he ru ka dngos por bsgom pa ni grol bar mi 'gyur na /
T02D1193:16a-26: 'di bsgoms pa ni rnam grol zhing //
T02D1193:16a-27: bsgoms pas 'ching ba bcings pa las /
T02D1193:16a-29: 'di bsgoms pas ni rnam grol zhing //
T02D1193:16a-30: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par bya'o //
T02D1193:16a-31: bsgoms pas 'ching ba ni dngos por bsgoms pas 'ching ba yin la /
T02D1193:16a-32: dngos po he ru ka'i skul bya la /
T02D1193:16a-33: de nyid chu zla ltar skye 'gog dang bral bar shes pa ni /
T02D1193:16a-34: de yis grol bar yongs shes bya //
T02D1193:16a-36: de bas na mkhas pa ni ma skyes par shes pa ste /
T02D1193:16a-37: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par shes pa'o //
T02D1193:16a-38: dngos po rang bzhin med par shes pa de bzhin du /
T02D1193:16a-39: he ru ka'i sku yang dngos po med par shes pa'i don du /
T02D1193:16a-40: ye shes lus la gnas pa ste /
T02D1193:16a-41: dngos po kun la khyab par gnas //
T02D1193:16a-43: gong ma lta bu'i ye shes ni gzhan na med de /
T02D1193:16a-44: rang gi sems nyid 'od gsal bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:16a-45: ye shes ther zug ma yin pas dngos po kun la khyab ces bya ste /
T02D1193:16a-46: thams cad kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:16a-47: 'o na de lus la gnas zhes smos pas na /
T02D1193:16a-48: dngos po thams cad yin no zhe na /
T02D1193:16b-1: lus la 'das zhes smos pa yin no //
T02D1193:16b-2: de bas na ye shes de ni gcig dang du ma'i bdag nyid dang bral ba /
T02D1193:16b-3: rtog pa ste mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa las 'das pa'i don to //
T02D1193:16b-4: la la dag ni shes rab kyi rang gi ngo bo bya ba la /
T02D1193:16b-5: lus la spyir ye shes gnas pa'i rnam grangs ni
T02D1193:16b-6: nadi stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa
T02D1193:16b-7: mang yang / mdor na sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
T02D1193:16b-8: de dag gi gtso bo ni rtsa gsum yin te /
T02D1193:16b-9: la la n'a ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo ste g-yas na gnas so //
T02D1193:16b-10: ra sa n'a ni thabs rnam par ngag pa'i bdag nyid g-yon na gnas so //
T02D1193:16b-11: aa wa dh'u t'i ni byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo dbus na gnas te /
T02D1193:16b-12: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1193:16b-13: la la n'a ni mi bskyod rgyu //
T02D1193:16b-15: g-yas pa'i rtsa las dri chu 'byung ba na aag sho by'a'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1193:16b-16: ra sa n'a ni khrag kyang rgyu zhes pa ni g-yon na gnas pa ste /
T02D1193:16b-17: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1193:16b-18: aa wa dh'u t'ir rab grags pa //
T02D1193:16b-19: shes rab zla ba rgyu bar 'dod //
T02D1193:16b-20: ces pa ni dbus na gnas pa ste /
T02D1193:16b-21: don yod grub pa'i bdag nyid kyi don to //
T02D1193:16b-22: mi phred pa dang phra ba'i gzugs //
T02D1193:16b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1193:16b-24: na di sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ming ngo //
T02D1193:16b-25: de dag gi glangs [?] ni mi phyed pas ni so dang sen mo skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-26: phra pa'i gzugs kyis skra dang spu skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-27: lha zhes bya ba'i rtsas ni pags pa skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-28: g-yon pas ni sha skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-29: g-yon pa can gyis ni chu ba skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-30: rus sbal skyes kyis ni rus pa skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-31: dngos po can gyis ni mkhal ma skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-32: dbang gis ni snying skyed do ;
T02D1193:16b-33: / gnos pas ni mig skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-34: byin rlabs kyis ni mkhris pa skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-35: ma mos ni glo ba skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-36: mtshan mo rgyu bas ni rgyu ma skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-37: grub ster gyis ni grang ba skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-38: au da ri ni dar ni sa lto ba skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-39: la la n'a nis mi bskyod skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-40: aa wadh'u t'is ni shes rab zla ba rgyu ba skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-42: drang pos ni bshang ba skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-43: mdog nag gis ni sha dang pags pa'i srubs skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-44: thun mong gis ni mchil ma skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-45: gzhir ster gyis ni rna spabs skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-46: rnal bral gyis ni khrag skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-47: dga' bas ni tshil skyed do //
T02D1193:16b-48: grub pas ni mchil ma skyed do //
T02D1193:17a-1: smin gyis ni mig rang skyed do //
T02D1193:17a-2: me tog gis ni snabs skyed do //
T02D1193:17a-3: mkhris gsum gyis ni gzugs skyed do //
T02D1193:17a-5: khyim gyis ni dri skyed do //
T02D1193:17a-7: ka ta yas ni rag bya skyed do //
T02D1193:17a-8: bdud kyi bu mos ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02D1193:17a-9: de dag ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi skye ba dang bskyod pa'o //
T02D1193:17a-10: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni lha mo ste bdag med ma dang /
T02D1193:17a-25: de lha mo de rnams rtsa gnyis gnyis la dbang zhing dag pa'o //
T02D1193:17a-26: de las la la n'a dang /
T02D1193:17a-28: aa wa ddh'u t'i ni bdag med pa'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1193:17a-29: lhag ma nyi shu rtsa dgu ni 'bad pas spang bar bya'o //
T02D1193:17a-30: ci'i phyir na de dag ni sus kyang mi rtogs shing ;
T02D1193:17a-31: gzhi'i don gyi bya ba mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1193:17a-33: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu lags /
T02D1193:17a-35: srid gsum ma lus yongs bsgyur cing //
T02D1193:17a-36: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o //
T02D1193:17a-38: srid pa gsum ni khams gsum ste /
T02D1193:17a-39: de nyid he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D1193:17a-40: gzung ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
T02D1193:17a-41: 'dzin pa ni sems te de yang yul ngo bo
T02D1193:17a-42: nyid kyis ma grub na sems kyang ma grub ste
T02D1193:17a-43: / yul sems gnyis stong pa nyid du gyur pa ni rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
T02D1193:17a-44: dngos su rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa yul snang ba dang /
T02D1193:17a-45: de rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang gnyis su med par gyur pa'o //
T02D1193:17a-46: gzhan du ltar sgrub pa'i thabs yod dam snyam pa la /
T02D1193:17a-47: gzhan du thabs rnams thams cad ni //
T02D1193:17a-48: dngos po'i mtshan nyid dag tu bshad //
T02D1193:17a-49: ces pa la gzung 'dzin dag pa'i thabs las bzhan pa /
T02D1193:17a-50: dngos po thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dpal he ru kar brtags la /
T02D1193:17a-51: de ni me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar ngo bo nyid med par shes pa'i don /
T02D1193:17a-52: sdom pa'i dbye bas bshad bya ste //
T02D1193:17a-55: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1193:17a-56: ya ni sgrol ma dag tu bshad //
T02D1193:17b-0: ces @17b bya bas ni spyi sdom bstan la /
T02D1193:17b-1: de dag gi dbye ba ni /
T02D1193:17b-2: sprul pa'i 'khor lo bya ba las //
T02D1193:17b-3: rgyud spyir smos par shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:17b-4: de la sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma drug cu zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1193:17b-5: lte ba'i rtsa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa ste /
T02D1193:17b-6: 'dab ma la ka chen sum cu rtsa gnyis nyis lnga btu brtsis pa'o //
T02D1193:17b-8: snying gar chos kyi 'khor lo 'bab ma brgyad pa la /
T02D1193:17b-9: yab yum bzhi dbus su h'um dgod do //
T02D1193:17b-10: mgrin par longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa la /
T02D1193:17b-11: aa chen bcu drug bkod la /
T02D1193:17b-13: spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis la ;
T02D1193:17b-14: ka chen sum cu rtsa gnyis bkod la /
T02D1193:17b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1193:17b-18: dga' ba dang sbyar yab yum gyi kha dog dang
T02D1193:17b-19: dbyibs sna tshogs su snang ba la dga' ba'i don
T02D1193:17b-20: / rnam par smin pa shin tu dga' ba dang sbyar /
T02D1193:17b-21: rnam par 'joms pa ni mchog tu dga' ba dang sbyar /
T02D1193:17b-22: rnam pa'i mtshan nyid ni mthar thug pa'i dga' ba dang sbyar /
T02D1193:17b-24: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang sbyar /
T02D1193:17b-25: lhag ma yang ci rigs par sbyar par bya'o //
T02D1193:17b-26: bdag gi de kho na nyid ces smos pa la /
T02D1193:17b-27: lus dang sems la cha shas kyis gzhig dang ngo bo nyid ma grub pa'o //
T02D1193:17b-28: lha ni lha'i bdag nyid chu'i zla ba ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:17b-29: yig 'bru gsum gyi rang bzhin ma grub par shes pa ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D1193:17b-30: ye shes ni rang rig pa'i shes pa ma grub par shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:17b-31: dga' ba rnams gnas brtan pa'i sde la sogs pa
T02D1193:17b-32: ni 'og nas 'byung ba dang 'brel pas 'dir ma
T02D1193:17b-33: bris so // de dag thams cad ni ae wam du 'dus so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1193:17b-34: gong 'og nas ae wam ma y'a bzhi dang thabs dang shes rab tu sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:17b-35: tsanda l'i yi lte bar las //
T02D1193:17b-36: bde gshegs lnga ni sreg par byed //
T02D1193:17b-37: spyan sogs lnga ni bsregs nas kyang //
T02D1193:17b-38: ham bsregs sha sha'i rgyun yang 'bab //
T02D1193:17b-40: lte bar ni chags pa chen po me 'bar ba zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1193:17b-41: tsanda l'i ni rigs ngan te /
T02D1193:17b-42: de dang su yang reg par mi nus pa ltar /
T02D1193:17b-43: kar ni ka las su ka byung ba de mthar
T02D1193:17b-44: thug pa'i dga' ba 'od gsal ba las byung ba
T02D1193:18a-2: reg par dka' zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:18a-3: des ni 'bar ba ste sems can gyi 'dod chags
T02D1193:18a-4: kyi me nyid stong pa nyid du 'bar ba zhes
T02D1193:18a-5: bya'o // bde gshegs lnga ni sreg par byed //
T02D1193:18a-7: des rigs lnga la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad yang bsregs te /
T02D1193:18a-8: ye shes su zhu ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:18a-9: de bzhin du yum lnga yang zhu ba'i don to //
T02D1193:18a-10: ham bsregs sha sha'i rgyun yang 'bab //
T02D1193:18a-12: bde ba chen po'i gnas tshangs pa'i sgor ham zhes
T02D1193:18a-13: bya ba don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin de las
T02D1193:18a-14: bde ba chen pa'i sa bon /
T02D1193:18a-15: zla ba zhu ba nyid na di sum cu rtsa gnyis su byung ste /
T02D1193:18a-16: ka lo ka'i kar ni kar 'od gsal ba sangs
T02D1193:18a-17: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag
T02D1193:18a-19: yang na ham bsregs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1193:18a-20: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i gnas su /
T02D1193:18a-21: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus la /
T02D1193:18a-22: bde ba chen po nyid dang /
T02D1193:18a-23: sangs rgyas rnams 'dres te gcig tu gyur pa de ham gi bdag nyid du gyur la /
T02D1193:18a-24: de nyid zla ba zhu ba'i bdud rtsir gyur pa /
T02D1193:18a-26: kar ni 'di dbus su 'od gsal bar 'bab ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:18a-29: zhes bya ba lte ba ni thab khung ka lo ka'o //
T02D1193:18a-30: 'bar ba ni rang rig pa'i ye shes 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1193:18a-31: dngos su snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi me byung ste 'bar ba'o //
T02D1193:18a-32: bde gshegs lnga ni bsreg bya ste //
T02D1193:18a-34: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtog pa lnga dang bral ba'o //
T02D1193:18a-35: spyan sogs lnga yang bsreg byas la //
T02D1193:18a-37: khams lnga'i rtog pa dang bral ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:18a-38: ham bsregs sha sha'i rgyun yang 'bab //
T02D1193:18a-40: spyi bo'i ham zla ba zhu ste na de'i lam
T02D1193:18a-41: du byung ste 'od 'bar bas nam mkhar bab pas
T02D1193:18a-42: rtog pa thams cad dang bral ste /
T02D1193:18a-43: rigs lnga'i phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i don to //
T02D1193:18a-44: tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni man ngag gi gnas chen po ste /
T02D1193:18a-46: theg pa dman pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1193:18a-47: dgongs pa'i don rnams sbas te bshad pa ste /
T02D1193:18a-48: bla ma'i kha las shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:18a-49: rgyud 'di nyid kyi nang nas kyang //
T02D1193:18a-50: mthar thug gzhan gyis mi rtogs te //
T02D1193:18b-0: gang la rnyed @18b par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1193:18b-1: bla ma'i thabs rgyud bsnyen bkur dang //
T02D1193:18b-2: bdag nyid bsod nams ldan par ro //
T02D1193:18b-4: man ngag rnams ni rna ba nas rna bar brgyud
T02D1193:18b-5: de ston gyi tshig dang yi ger ni ma bris
T02D1193:18b-6: so // de bas na bla ma dam pa rnams yun ring du bsnyen bkur byas te /
T02D1193:18b-7: man ngag thob nas bsgrubs na 'grub //
T02D1193:18b-11: // / de nas gnyis pa sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya ste /
T02D1193:18b-15: sgrub pa la sogs pa'i sngags 'chad pa'i don to //
T02D1193:18b-16: aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba ni dang po sngags kyi sgo ste ;
T02D1193:18b-17: chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1193:18b-18: a'adya nuta ces bya ba ni sgo de las skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:18b-19: panna tv'ata aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /

T02D1193:28a-36: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02D1193:28a-37: de bas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02D1193:28a-38: sems can gnod pa spang bar bya'o //
T02D1193:28a-40: gong ma'i rdzas rnams blang zhes bya ba'i don /
T02D1193:28a-41: ku ru ku lle'i sgrub pa bshad //
T02D1193:28a-42: ces ba la sogs pa ni brda phrad sla bas ma bris so //
T02D1193:28a-43: le'u bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1193:28a-45: // /'di man chad brtag pa gnyis rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma 'chad de /
T02D1193:28a-46: de las kyang le'u dang po bshad pa ston to //
T02D1193:28a-47: 'dir sku gzugs rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bstan pas na /
T02D1193:28a-48: sgo bsal bas ci rigs par shes par gyis shig
T02D1193:28b-0: / da ni @28b le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa bstan
T02D1193:28b-1: te / 'di las shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ston te //
T02D1193:28b-2: bcom ldan chos rnams thams cad kyi //
T02D1193:28b-3: ji ltar rgya mtshor ku ba bzhin //
T02D1193:28b-5: 'khor ba'i dngos po rgya mtsho las //
T02D1193:28b-6: chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1193:28b-7: de yang dper na rgya mtsho ni rgya che zhing zab kyang /
T02D1193:28b-8: thabs mkhas pa'i skyes bus ku ba gnyis gshibs pa la zhon te song na /
T02D1193:28b-9: mthar gyis pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin pa ltar /
T02D1193:28b-10: chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i dngos grub rgya chen po ste /
T02D1193:28b-11: ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes zhus pa'o //
T02D1193:28b-13: bdag med pa yis rnal 'byor bdag / yang na dpal ldan khrag 'thung sbyor //
T02D1193:28b-15: bdag med pa la 'jug pa dang /
T02D1193:28b-16: dpal he ru ka'i sku sgyu ma lta bu la
T02D1193:28b-17: skad cig tsam yang mi g-yeng ba'i sems kyis gnas
T02D1193:28b-18: shig bsgoms na / dngos grub thob po zhes pa'i don /
T02D1193:28b-19: de bas na rtsa ba las /
T02D1193:28b-20: skad cig tsam ni gzhan pa'i sems //
T02D1193:28b-23: lhag ma ni go sla bas ma dris so //
T02D1193:28b-24: rig pa lan cig byas pa yis //
T02D1193:28b-25: rtags ni de ma thag tu 'byung //
T02D1193:28b-27: shes rab dang mnyam par bzhag pas mthar thug pa'i dga' ba las ye shes 'byung ste /
T02D1193:28b-28: dngos grub 'byung zhes bya ba'i don //
T02D1193:28b-29: zla ba gcig tu gsang ba spyod //
T02D1193:28b-30: gang yang rung ba'i zla ba la sgrub ces byas te /
T02D1193:28b-31: rtags byung nas dngos grub blangs pa'i thabs so //
T02D1193:28b-32: gang du phyag rgya mi rnyed na //
T02D1193:28b-33: drin gyis phog pa'i sngags pa la /
T02D1193:28b-34: 'di zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya long //
T02D1193:28b-36: gal te sems byang nas dngos grub tu gyur ma khad nas /
T02D1193:28b-37: rang la phyag rgya med pa la 'byor pa rnams
T02D1193:28b-38: kyis ming 'di zhes bya ba ni byag rgya ston
T02D1193:28b-39: pas na / de rtog pa med par blangs la sgrub ces pa'i don to //
T02D1193:28b-40: bdag nyid mthu yis brtags nas kyang //
T02D1193:28b-41: longs spyod phyir ni spyod min bshad //
T02D1193:28b-43: bdag gi sems sbyangs pa dang /
T02D1193:28b-44: rtog pa zad cing man ngag thob pas sgrub kyi /
T02D1193:28b-45: 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi phyir spyod pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1193:28b-46: gal te 'dod pa'i phyir spyod na ni /
T02D1193:29a-2: sems can dmyal ba la sogs par skye ba'i don /
T02D1193:29a-3: rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa las kyang /
T02D1193:29a-4: gzhan du 'dod pa'i longs spyod la //
T02D1193:29a-5: mngon par 'dod pa skyes gyur na //
T02D1193:29a-6: ma goms dbang gis sngags pa ni //
T02D1193:29a-9: gzhung gzhan la ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i grogs rig pa de dang /
T02D1193:29a-10: bdag sgrub pa po gnyi ga yang dbang dang dam tshig tu ldan pa /
T02D1193:29a-11: sems shin tu byang ba man ngag thob pa rnams kyis mchod cing bsgrubs na /
T02D1193:29a-13: gzhan dag gis tshig tsam du bzlas te /
T02D1193:29a-14: gzu lums su spyad na bdag kyang ngan 'gro la sogs pa rnams su brlag la /
T02D1193:29a-15: gzhan yang phung bar byed pa yin pas na /
T02D1193:29a-16: tshul bzhin du sgrub cing mchod ces pa'i don /
T02D1193:29a-18: bdag med rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba //
T02D1193:29a-19: phyag rgya rnams kyi khyad par ni //
T02D1193:29a-20: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis pa'o //
T02D1193:29a-22: bdag med pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1193:29a-23: thabs med par shes rab gcig pu la mi 'grub la /
T02D1193:29a-24: shes rab med par yang thabs kyis mi 'grub ste /
T02D1193:29a-25: de bas na de gnyis bstan pa las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'byung bas na /
T02D1193:29a-26: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:29a-27: 'o na gong du lha mo 'ba' zhig gis dkyil 'khor la ji ltar dngos grub skye zhe na /
T02D1193:29a-29: bud med gzugs ni spangs nas kyang //
T02D1193:29a-30: bcom ldan gzugs ni gzhan byas te //
T02D1193:29a-31: zhes pa la lha mo'i gzugs spangs nas thabs kyi gzugs su bya ba ste /
T02D1193:29a-32: de yi phyag rgya ma gnyis spangs te padma'i sgor sbyar bas rdo rjer gyur la /
T02D1193:29a-33: cig shos kyis sgre'ur gyur te /
T02D1193:29a-34: ngos gnyis su ni dril bu yis //
T02D1193:29a-36: de nas gzugs ril gyis he ru kar gyur pa'i don /
T02D1193:29a-37: de lta bu'i thabs kyis bsgrubs na dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:29a-38: des yon tan ni sgrub cing chos na /
T02D1193:29a-39: skye ba dang 'jig pa las grol te /
T02D1193:29a-40: shes rab thabs kyis gnon mi nus //
T02D1193:29a-42: de bas na thabs kyis ni skye ba'i 'khor ba med par byed la /
T02D1193:29a-43: shes rab kyis ni 'jigs pa'i 'khor ba las rgal bas /
T02D1193:29a-44: srid mthar byed ces pa'i don /
T02D1193:29a-45: des na 'jigs pa med cing skye ba med pa
T02D1193:29b-0: @29b de ltar thabs dang shes rab gnyis las grub
T02D1193:29b-1: pas ni / dngos po 'khor ba skye ba dang mthun pa las thar te /
T02D1193:29b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grub ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:29b-3: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor bas ni bya ba nas /
T02D1193:29b-4: rtag tu sbyor ba byas pa yin //
T02D1193:29b-5: zhes bya ba'i bar ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dngos
T02D1193:29b-6: po skye ba ther zug tu rtog pa sel te
T02D1193:29b-7: / tshig gi don ni rgyud las gsal bar ma bris so //
T02D1193:29b-8: da ni dbang bskur ba'i thabs bstan te /
T02D1193:29b-9: bde ba nag po la sogs pa ni /
T02D1193:29b-10: dngos po thams cad bde ba chen po las logs na med ces bstan pa'o //
T02D1193:29b-11: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'i tshig go //
T02D1193:29b-12: bcom ldan bde chen mchog dam las thams cad 'byung na /
T02D1193:29b-13: bskyed pa'i rim pa gong du bstan pas ci zhig bgyi zhes zhus pa la bka' stsal pa /
T02D1193:29b-14: dad pa'i shugs can khyod bden mi bden yang /
T02D1193:29b-15: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ma brten par /
T02D1193:29b-16: rdzogs pa'i rim pa logs na med de /
T02D1193:29b-18: dngos med lus las bde ba gang //
T02D1193:29b-19: bde ba ngag gis brjod mi nus //
T02D1193:29b-20: gzugs can khyab pas khyab pa yi //
T02D1193:29b-21: 'gro ba rnams ni bde bas khyab //
T02D1193:29b-23: bde ba ni lus la brten nas skye'i /
T02D1193:29b-24: dngos po med pa las ni ma yin no //
T02D1193:29b-25: de bas na 'gro ba rnams ni bde bas khyab //
T02D1193:29b-26: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1193:29b-27: gang yang le los zil non bya ba ni /
T02D1193:29b-28: de lta'i bde ba chen po ni le lo can sems rnam par g-yeng ba /
T02D1193:29b-29: 'du 'dzi'i dbang du gyur pas mi rtog pa'i don /
T02D1193:29b-30: gru gsum chos kyi phyag rgya de ni /
T02D1193:29b-31: sangs rgyas la sogs pa sa bcu'i khyad par gyi yon tan dpag tu med pa skye bas na /
T02D1193:29b-32: rin chen za ma tog ces bya'o //
T02D1193:29b-33: mthar thug dga' ba'i rang ngo bo /
T02D1193:29b-35: gsum pa spangs pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1193:29b-37: shin tu dga' ba rnams ni goms pa las /
T02D1193:29b-38: dper na mun par sgron ma bteg na shin tu gsal ba ltar /
T02D1193:29b-39: dga' ba'i snang bas dngos po la rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa bsal nas /
T02D1193:29b-40: mchog gi dngos grub thob ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:29b-41: gsal byed kyang ni de bzhin no //
T02D1193:29b-43: dga' ba rnams kyis grub pa thob pa ltar /
T02D1193:29b-44: a'a li k'a li yi ge rnams las kyang //
T02D1193:29b-45: dngos grub 'byung zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:30a-1: dpe don rnams ni brda phrang sla'o //
T02D1193:30a-4: 'dod chags 'khrig pas 'khor bar 'ching ba rnams ni /
T02D1193:30a-5: man ngag bla ma la bsnyen bkur byas pas thob nas /
T02D1193:30a-6: dga' ba rnams ltar spyad pas /
T02D1193:30a-7: 'dod chags 'khor bar skye ba'i me 'dod chags rnam par dag pa /
T02D1193:30a-8: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis zhi ste /
T02D1193:30a-9: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1193:30a-10: de su'i spyod yul yin zhe na /
T02D1193:30a-11: zlog pa'i brtag pa 'di nyid ni //
T02D1193:30a-12: sangs rgyas mu stegs can gyis min //
T02D1193:30a-14: dngos po nyan thos kyi rigs can lta ba dang /
T02D1193:30a-15: spyod pa dman pa la mos pa dngos grub chen
T02D1193:30a-16: po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams kyi yul ma
T02D1193:30a-18: 'byung ba rang gzugs lnga pa ni //
T02D1193:30a-19: bde ba chen po lnga ru 'gyur //
T02D1193:30a-21: bde ba chen po zla ba zhu ba la /
T02D1193:30a-22: 'byung ba lnga tshang la de la bde ba lnga zhes bya'o //
T02D1193:30a-23: lnga bo rnams kyang bde ba'i dngos po ni gcig las med ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:30a-24: shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1193:30a-25: bya ba la sogs pa la shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma la /
T02D1193:30a-28: rigs rnam pa lnga la sogs pa /
T02D1193:30a-29: skad cig ma'i tshul gyis rdzogs pa ni ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:30a-32: // / da ni le'u gsum pa'i bshad ba ston te /
T02D1193:30a-33: rgyud thams cad kyi rtog pa brjod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1193:30a-34: thabs kyi rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1193:30a-35: shes rab kyi rgyud nges par brjod pa bla ma'i
T02D1193:30a-36: rgyud la sogs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1193:30a-37: dang / man ngag gsal bar ston zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1193:30a-38: de las khyad par du rnal 'byor ma ste /
T02D1193:30a-39: shes rab kyi rgyud mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog
T02D1193:30a-40: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud thams cad gtan
T02D1193:30a-43: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ston pas na /
T02D1193:30a-44: de la sdom pa bshad par bya //
T02D1193:30a-46: sdom pa sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D1193:30a-47: ae wam la ni rab tu bzhugs //
T02D1193:30a-49: rnam pa'i sdom pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad de /
T02D1193:30a-50: sangs rgyas ni ae wam la 'dus te /
T02D1193:30b-2: byin du ni byang chub kyi sems yin te /
T02D1193:30b-3: sems de bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya'o //
T02D1193:30b-4: de yang dngos su sgrub pa po dang /
T02D1193:30b-6: bsgrub par bya ba gsum dgongs pa'i don gyis bshad pa ste /
T02D1193:30b-7: sgrub pa po ni rnal 'byor pa /
T02D1193:30b-8: rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid pa yin la /
T02D1193:30b-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ae yin la /
T02D1193:30b-11: bsgrub par bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1193:30b-13: de lta bu'i man ngag slob dpon gyis phog cing
T02D1193:30b-14: dbang bskur ba la bde ba chen po gcig pu
T02D1193:30b-15: byed ces bya'o // gang 'di ae ni sna tshogs sku //
T02D1193:30b-16: zhes bya ba la yi ge ae ste /
T02D1193:30b-17: mkha' de nyid thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa /
T02D1193:30b-18: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1193:30b-19: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1193:30b-21: mkha' de'i dbus su wam ste thabs dang byang chub kyi sems gnas zhes bya'o //
T02D1193:30b-22: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa la /
T02D1193:30b-23: sangs rgyas kyang yin la rin po che yang yin pas na rin chen no //
T02D1193:30b-24: za ma tog ltar mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'am /
T02D1193:30b-25: gzhal yas khang gi yon tan dam pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog ste /
T02D1193:30b-26: dngos su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che ste /
T02D1193:30b-27: che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:30b-28: gnas der ni bde ba dang dga' ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pas na /
T02D1193:30b-29: de las skyes zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1193:30b-30: skad cig dbye ba'i khyad par can //
T02D1193:30b-32: mthar thug pa'i ye shes skad cig ma ni /
T02D1193:30b-33: gong ma'i ae wam las skyes pas na /
T02D1193:30b-34: ae wam la ni rab tu gnas //
T02D1193:30b-35: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:30b-36: de yang rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhi pos ston to //
T02D1193:30b-37: 'dir rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1193:30b-38: dga' ba rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D1193:30b-39: dbang bskur ba rnam pa bzhi la sogs pa /
T02D1193:30b-40: man ngag gi gnas chen po bcu gnyis la sogs pa ni bla ma'i bka' las shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:30b-41: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba /
T02D1193:30b-42: dam tshig rnams ni gang la gnas //
T02D1193:30b-43: sdom pa rnams ni gang zhig yin //
T02D1193:30b-44: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D1193:30b-45: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02D1193:31a-1: gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya //
T02D1193:31a-2: khyod kyis ma byin blang bar bya //
T02D1193:31a-3: gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis //
T02D1193:31a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1193:31a-5: 'dir gang zag kha cig gis sgra ji bzhin du bzung ste /
T02D1193:31a-6: srog gcod pa la sogs pa log par spyod pa
T02D1193:31a-7: yod de srog gcod pa ni rang bzhin gyis kha
T02D1193:31a-8: na ma tho ba rnams kyi nang na yang ches
T02D1193:31a-10: ngan song gi rgyu'i gtso bor gsungs pa dang /
T02D1193:31a-11: mi dge pa chen po yin zhing ston pa'i bstan pa la 'gal ba'i rtsa ba yin te /
T02D1193:31a-12: de bas na bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' mtha' dag
T02D1193:31a-13: las srog gcod pa mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o
T02D1193:31a-14: // srog gcod pa ni mu stegs kyi chos kha cig las 'byung ste /
T02D1193:31a-15: sngon bram ze sha la dga' ba dag cig gis sha 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02D1193:31a-16: ri dags dang phyugs la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas gzhan gyi mig brid de /
T02D1193:31a-17: tha mar phyugs dngos su gsod cing de nyid lhar
T02D1193:31a-18: skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gzhung sgrub pa dag la
T02D1193:31a-19: / mu stegs gzhan gtsang mar spyod pa brtul zhugs
T02D1193:31a-20: la gnas pa bsam gtan la 'jog pa dag chos
T02D1193:31a-22: de yang drang srong rgyas pas rang gi bu bram
T02D1193:31a-23: ze khye'u ne tso mchod sbyin la btsud pa dang
T02D1193:31a-24: / ne tsos pha la 'di skad du /
T02D1193:31a-25: mchod sdong btsugs pas phyugs bsad de //
T02D1193:31a-26: khrag gi dam tshig byas gyur pa //
T02D1193:31a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pas /
T02D1193:31a-30: sun phyung bar gyur to zhes grags na /
T02D1193:31a-31: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis /
T02D1193:31a-32: de la chos dang ldan pa'i lam zhes ji ltar bgrang //
T02D1193:31a-33: gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dpal gyi sdes mdzad pa las /
T02D1193:31a-34: de la srog gcod pa zhes bya ba na /
T02D1193:31a-35: ye shes kyi rdo rjes sems can gyi khams ma
T02D1193:31a-36: lus pa mi dmigs par byed pa'i stong pa nyid
T02D1193:31a-37: kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa de gang
T02D1193:31a-38: yin pa de / 'dir srog gcod pa zhes bshad pa dang /
T02D1193:31a-39: de yang de nyid kyi t'i k'a las kyang /
T02D1193:31a-40: srog ces bya ba rlung chen po rtag tu 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02D1193:31a-41: bkag cing bsdams pa la ni srog gcod pa zhes bya'i /
T02D1193:31a-42: sems can bsad pa ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ste /
T02D1193:31b-0: des na 'di'i don kyang srog dang rtsol ba @31b bsdams nas /
T02D1193:31b-1: sems nang du bsdus te mtshan ma med pa'i ting
T02D1193:31b-2: nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog pa ni srog gcod
T02D1193:31b-3: pa zhes bya'o zhes dgongs so //
T02D1193:31b-4: gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa las kyang /
T02D1193:31b-5: de la ye shes kyi rdo rjes sems can gyi
T02D1193:31b-6: khams ma lus pa dngos po med par byed pa'i
T02D1193:31b-7: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i don
T02D1193:31b-8: ni srog gcod pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1193:31b-9: gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa sgron ma gsal bar byed pa las kyang /
T02D1193:31b-10: sems can thams cad bsad na ni //
T02D1193:31b-12: stong pa nyid du bya bas rnam par bshig pa'o zhes bshad pa dang /
T02D1193:31b-13: dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las /
T02D1193:31b-14: gang gis phung sogs dngos med pa //
T02D1193:31b-15: zhi gnas las kyang sems kyis byas //
T02D1193:31b-16: de ni srog gcod byed pa ste //
T02D1193:31b-17: theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa yin //
T02D1193:31b-19: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1193:31b-20: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus //
T02D1193:31b-21: sems can thams cad bsad na ni //
T02D1193:31b-22: mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu //
T02D1193:31b-23: rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1193:31b-25: bshad ma thag pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis /
T02D1193:31b-26: bdag gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa rnam par bshig ste /
T02D1193:31b-27: ma skyes par bsgom pa'i don to //
T02D1193:31b-28: 'bras bu gsungs pa ni mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba'o //
T02D1193:31b-29: de bas na bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba 'dis sku
T02D1193:31b-30: dang gsung dang thugs mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1193:31b-32: mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D1193:31b-33: la la dag ni srog gcod pa ni sems can

T02D1193:31b-35: / de lta bu ma yin te /
T02D1193:31b-36: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D1193:31b-37: tshogs dpag tu med par bsags nas /
T02D1193:31b-38: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las byang
T02D1193:31b-39: chub kyi skam la 'don pa ni sgrol ba zhes
T02D1193:31b-40: bya'i / gsod pa la ni mi bya ste /

T02D1193:31b-42: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che
T02D1193:31b-43: rnams kyis gsod pa'i sbyor ba 'ba' zhig gis sems
T02D1193:32a-2: rnam pa de lta bu gang nas kyang ma gsungs /
T02D1193:32a-4: bsgral ba'i tshig gis don yang gsod pa ma yin no //

T02D1193:32a-6: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa mtha' dag dang 'gal ba nyid yin pas /
T02D1193:32a-7: byang chub kyi lam du mi rung ngo //
T02D1193:32a-8: spros pas chog gi dkyus ma nyid la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1193:32a-9: de bas na rgyud nyid las /
T02D1193:32a-10: srog ni sems zhes bshad pa ste //
T02D1193:32a-11: gcig pa'i sems ni srog bcad yin //
T02D1193:32a-13: bdag gi sems 'od gsal ba dang /
T02D1193:32a-14: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang chos thams cad
T02D1193:32a-15: shes rab kyi mtshon gyis skye ba med par shes
T02D1193:32a-16: pa ni srog gcod pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1193:32a-17: brdzun gyi chig tu smra ba la sogs pa rang
T02D1193:32a-18: bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yin pa'i phyir
T02D1193:32a-19: / 'phags pa'i lam dang 'gal ba yin pa dang /
T02D1193:32a-20: dngos po brdzun smra ba ni ma yin no //
T02D1193:32a-21: snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa'i phyi nang gi chos
T02D1193:32a-22: thams cad ni byed pa pos byas pa ma yin
T02D1193:32a-23: zhing / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgyu ma
T02D1193:32a-24: lta bu rgyu rkyen la rag las pa slu ba'i
T02D1193:32a-25: chos can yin par ston pa ni brdzun du smra
T02D1193:32a-26: zhing / ba'o // de yang dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las /
T02D1193:32a-27: nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag ;
T02D1193:32a-28: / rten 'byung gnyis su ston pa ni /
T02D1193:32a-29: de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste //
T02D1193:32a-30: gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1193:32a-31: zhes smras pa ni brdzun du smra ba'o //
T02D1193:32a-32: sems can gyi khams thams cad sku dang gsung dang
T02D1193:32a-33: thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bskyed par bsgoms pas
T02D1193:32a-34: / sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i sems dang
T02D1193:32a-35: sems las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rdzas phrogs
T02D1193:32a-38: de yang dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las /
T02D1193:32a-39: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang //
T02D1193:32a-40: de ni rjes su shes bya ste //
T02D1193:32a-41: de phrogs ngang tshul gang yin pa //
T02D1193:32a-42: gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod //
T02D1193:32a-43: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
T02D1193:32a-44: dang mnyam pa'i lha mo thams cad dang yang dag
T02D1193:32a-45: par mnyam par sbyor ba'i bsgom pa ni rtag tu
T02D1193:32a-47: bud med mchog ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab
T02D1193:32b-0: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de @32b bzhin gshegs
T02D1193:32b-1: pa thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa /
T02D1193:32b-2: mtshan gyi rnam pa gzhan yang phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba yin te /
T02D1193:32b-3: de dag dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa la dgongs nas /
T02D1193:32b-4: gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1193:32b-5: gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa //
T02D1193:32b-6: de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba //
T02D1193:32b-7: sems can de de 'dod la dga' //
T02D1193:32b-8: sgrub pa'i mchog la dam par 'gyur //
T02D1193:32b-10: de bas na rgyud 'di nyid las kyang 'jig rten bsgral bar bya zhes pa /
T02D1193:32b-11: brdzun gyi sgrar yang brjod pa yin //
T02D1193:32b-12: btsun mo'i shu kra ma byin len //
T02D1193:32b-13: gzhan gyi bud med rang gi lha mo //
T02D1193:32b-15: srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i tshig 'di rnams ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin pas na /
T02D1193:32b-16: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i don to //
T02D1193:32b-17: lhag ma ni brda phrad par sla bas ma bris so //
T02D1193:32b-18: dpa' bo thams cad bza' bar bya //
T02D1193:32b-19: zhes pa la gtsang btsog bzang ngan kun mnyam par bza' ba'i don /
T02D1193:32b-20: kha dog lnga ni mnyam par spyad //
T02D1193:32b-21: ces bya ba ni rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang rigs ngan dang dombi'i rigs so //
T02D1193:32b-22: bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang //
T02D1193:32b-24: bdud rtsi lnga ni rdzas lnga yin no //
T02D1193:32b-26: chang gi dug ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i dri ma'o //
T02D1193:32b-39: de dag mi rtog bza' bar bya //
T02D1193:32b-41: sna tshogs ri bo'i gos bgos shing //
T02D1193:32b-43: ro'i gos las kha dog mang po can gyi smad
T02D1193:32b-44: kyi dbang po 'gegs pa'i gos la bya ba'i don
T02D1193:32b-46: thal chen gyis lus bskus pa la bya ba'o //
T02D1193:32b-47: yi dags gnas las skyes pa'i me tog ni ro
T02D1193:32b-48: la bcings pa'i me tog gi phreng ba bor ba
T02D1193:32b-49: de mgo la bcing ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1193:32b-50: lhag ma ni brda phrad sla bas ma bris so //
T02D1193:32b-51: ka li ka ni sangs rgyas lnga //
T02D1193:32b-52: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
T02D1193:32b-53: de nyid mthar thug dga' ba ste //
T02D1193:32b-54: lhag ma ni ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1193:32b-57: // / da ni le'u bzhi pa bshad do /
T02D1193:33a-1: dang brda la sogs pa ston to //
T02D1193:33a-2: glu dang gar ni gnyis po yis //
T02D1193:33a-3: gar mchog glu ni blang bar bya //
T02D1193:33a-5: glu ni aa mi ta pa'i gzugs kyis blangs la gar ni he ru ka'i gzugs kyis bya'o //
T02D1193:33a-6: sgog skya'i dri la sogs pa ni grub pa thob par gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste /
T02D1193:33a-8: / ga bur la sogs pa'i dri zhim po 'byung ba'o //
T02D1193:33a-9: de bzhin dang pa la sogs pa'i sgra dang /
T02D1193:33a-10: ce sbyang ni ku zhes zer ro //
T02D1193:33a-11: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ni rgyud las gsal lo //
T02D1193:33a-12: mi shes sgrub pos dngos mi 'grub //
T02D1193:33a-14: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa lnga dang /
T02D1193:33a-15: rigs rnam pa ldang sbyar te sgrub pa ni /
T02D1193:33a-16: de dag gi rigs mthun par sbyar ba ste /
T02D1193:33a-17: dper na rims sel ba'i sngags la /
T02D1193:33a-18: rims kyi sngags zer ba dang 'dra bar /
T02D1193:33a-19: de dag gi gnyen por gyur pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1193:33a-20: de bas na chos mthun pa'i tshul ltar na /
T02D1193:33a-21: phung po lnga dang tshul mthun pa'i chos kyi sgos
T02D1193:33a-22: nyon mongs pa lnga rnam par dag pa ni rigs
T02D1193:33a-24: yod pa dang med pa dang /
T02D1193:33a-25: rtag pa dang chad pa dang /
T02D1193:33a-26: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa gnyis su
T02D1193:33a-27: dmigs pa'i shes pa la sdang zhing 'joms pas na
T02D1193:33a-28: zhe sdang ste / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1193:33a-29: de'i phyir zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1193:33a-30: mi bskyod pa ni bdag med zhe sdang phyag rgya ste /
T02D1193:33a-32: 'di ltar gti mug ni rmongs shing bye brag mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa ltar /
T02D1193:33a-33: chos kyi dbyings la nges par rtogs pa'i ye shes
T02D1193:33a-34: kyang chos thams cad ro gcig par rtog pa nyid
T02D1193:33a-35: kyis bye brag mi 'byed par cha mthun pas na
T02D1193:33a-36: / bems po ltar gnas pa'i phyir /
T02D1193:33a-37: gti mug rnam par dag pa ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1193:33a-38: dngos su rdo rje gti mug phyag rgya yin //
T02D1193:33a-39: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D1193:33a-40: phrag dog ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la mi bzod cing /
T02D1193:33a-41: bdag nyid 'byor pa dang ldan par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1193:33a-42: 'dir ni 'gro ba'i don gzhan la ltos pa med
T02D1193:33a-43: par bdag nyid gcig pus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
T02D1193:33a-45: las kyi mtshan nyid phrag dog rnam par dag pa ni don yod grub pa ste /
T02D1193:33a-46: dngos su goo r'i phrag dog phyag rgya ste //
T02D1193:33a-48: 'dod chags ni dngos po gang yang rung ba la
T02D1193:33b-0: chags shing zhen pa'i @33b mtshan nyid can yin la
T02D1193:33b-1: / sems can thams cad smin cing grol ba la chags pa'am /
T02D1193:33b-2: yang dag pa'i don la zhen cing mi gtong ba ni 'dod chags pa ste /
T02D1193:33b-3: de ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D1193:33b-4: dngos su ba r'i 'dod chags phyag rgya yin //
T02D1193:33b-6: nga rgyal ni rlom sems kyi bdag nyid yin la
T02D1193:33b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad dang bdag nyid mnyam par rtog
T02D1193:33b-8: pa'i dbang gis nga rgyal rnam par dag pa ni
T02D1193:33b-11: dngos su ser sna'i phyag na mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1193:33b-13: de bas na 'khor ba'i spyod yul nyon mongs pa'i
T02D1193:33b-14: rang bzhin can gyi 'dod chags la sogs pa la
T02D1193:33b-16: 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la sogs
T02D1193:33b-17: pa khong du chud pa'i gnyen pos snga ma'i rang
T02D1193:33b-19: rtogs pa'i khyad par gzhan skye ba ni /
T02D1193:33b-20: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgor gyur te /
T02D1193:33b-21: dper na dug sngags grub pas dug gi nus pa med par byas te /
T02D1193:33b-22: dug bsten pas sman du gyur pa'i nus pa gzhan skyes pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
T02D1193:33b-23: 'di skad du gsungs pa yin gyi gzhan du na
T02D1193:33b-24: 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyu ma tshang ba med pa
T02D1193:33b-25: yin zhing / ngan song la sogs par 'dren pa'i dug nyid yin pas /
T02D1193:33b-26: rgyu dang 'bras bu phyin ci log tu gyur pa ni 'gal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1193:33b-27: 'di dag bsten pa las rnam par dag pa'i ye
T02D1193:33b-28: shes 'byung zhing 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba mi srid
T02D1193:33b-29: do // de'i phyir spros pa med pa'i shes rab
T02D1193:33b-30: stobs su gyur pa dug sngags grub pa lta bus
T02D1193:33b-31: do // zin na / gdod thabs kyi dam par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1193:33b-32: de ltar na nyon mongs pa de rnams kyi gnyen po dang /
T02D1193:33b-33: de rnam par dag pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D1193:33b-34: las rigs lnga'i khyad par du snang ba yin pas
T02D1193:33b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs //
T02D1193:33b-37: de bzhin rmongs dang sdang las 'khrungs //
T02D1193:33b-39: dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1193:33b-40: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum //
T02D1193:33b-42: dug nyid nye bar zhi gyur na //
T02D1193:33b-43: dug ni dug med byas pa yin //
T02D1193:33b-45: dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02D1193:34a-0: 'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na sngags dang sman gyis yongs su zin @34a * //
T02D1193:34a-1: pa'i dug gis 'chi bar byed mi nus so //
T02D1193:34a-2: 'od srungs de bzhin du ye shes dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i dug gis kyang /
T02D1193:34a-3: log par ltung bar byed mi nus she'o //
T02D1193:34a-4: de ltar nyon mongs pa lnga po'i rnam par dag
T02D1193:34a-5: pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ston par mdzad
T02D1193:34a-6: pa 'di yang bde bar gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa
T02D1193:34a-7: nyid yin gyi / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1193:34a-9: gang gi rang bzhin chags dang rnam bral yang //
T02D1193:34a-10: gdul bya'i don phyir khro la khro ba dang //
T02D1193:34a-11: 'dod chags can la chags pa ltar ston pa //
T02D1193:34a-12: byang chub mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1193:34a-14: yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bag chags dang
T02D1193:34a-15: bas pa'i nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa'i mthar
T02D1193:34a-16: byon pa yin du zin kyang /
T02D1193:34a-17: gdul bya kha cig gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D1193:34a-18: btsun mo'i tshogs la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor te /
T02D1193:34a-19: bzhugs nas 'dod pa la sogs nye bar longs spyod pa lta bur ston par mdzad pa yang /
T02D1193:34a-20: ci zhig las dgongs te de ltar mdzad ce na /
T02D1193:34a-21: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha rnams bdag
T02D1193:34a-22: nyid kyi chung ma dang slas kyi tshogs pa 'dod
T02D1193:34a-23: pa'i longs spyod kyis shin tu dregs shing /
T02D1193:34a-24: rang las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med par rtogs pa dag gi dregs pa bsal nas /
T02D1193:34a-25: bstan pa la gzud par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin
T02D1193:34a-26: gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan tshad med pa rnam
T02D1193:34a-27: pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T02D1193:34a-28: la sogs pa lha mo'i bdag nyid du sprul pa
T02D1193:34a-29: pa bzhi dang / mdzad nas / lha las ches
T02D1193:34a-30: khyad par du gyur pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang
T02D1193:34a-32: de mthong nas rang gi 'khor ba shin tu yid
T02D1193:34a-33: byung zhing nga rgyal med pa'i sgo nas de bzhin
T02D1193:34a-34: gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs la 'dod pa skye bar
T02D1193:34a-35: 'gyur te / de dag thabs gang gis thob par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D1193:34a-36: de thob pa'i thabs su gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1193:34a-37: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la btsud pas /
T02D1193:34a-38: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan de dag thob par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1193:34a-39: yang dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D1193:34b-0: @34b rtag tu 'dod pa gnas pa yi //
T02D1193:34b-1: lha yi bu ni 'di rnams dang //
T02D1193:34b-2: 'dod chags can ni gzhan gyi phyir //
T02D1193:34b-3: rab dga'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa yin //
T02D1193:34b-5: 'di ni khyi gus khyi gu 'byin pa 'dra bar /
T02D1193:34b-6: skye bo 'dod chags kyi shas che ba la /
T02D1193:34b-7: 'dod chags sdong ba'i phyir shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i btsun mo'i tshogs dang /
T02D1193:34b-8: 'dod pa'i yul la spyod pa lta bur ston pa mdzad de /
T02D1193:34b-9: de tha mal pa'i 'dod pa la skyo ba bskyed cing /
T02D1193:34b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i 'byor pa la sems 'dun cing 'dod pa bskyed pa dang /
T02D1193:34b-11: de dag gi rang bzhin rtog par mdzad pas /
T02D1193:34b-12: de la zhen cing ma dang mar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang bral bas /
T02D1193:34b-13: rim gyis nyon mongs pa las grol zhing yon tan gyi tshogs rdzogs par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1193:34b-14: de bas na rdo rje dra ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1193:34b-15: 'gro ba 'dod chags kyis ni rmongs pa la //
T02D1193:34b-16: 'dod chags mi yis sel bar byed pa yin ;
T02D1193:34b-18: 'dir 'dod chags kyi rnam par dag pa rgya cher gsungs pa ni /
T02D1193:34b-19: mngal nas skye ba gdul ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1193:34b-20: rgyud 'di las shes rab dang snyoms par 'jug pa 'ba' zhig ston pa'i phyir /
T02D1193:34b-21: dgongs pa'i dbang gis de ltar ston par mdzad pa yin la /
T02D1193:34b-22: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags dang bcas par rtog cing /
T02D1193:34b-23: tshul dang mi mthun par 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1193:34b-24: de dag gis dgongs pa ma rtogs pa yin gyi /
T02D1193:34b-25: 'di ni 'gro ba gdul ba'i phyir thabs kyis mdzad pa nyid yin no //
T02D1193:34b-26: de yang 'jig rten dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pas /
T02D1193:34b-27: mar me mdzad nas bzung nas ni //
T02D1193:34b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags bral //
T02D1193:34b-29: sgra gcan zin la sras zhes gsungs //
T02D1193:34b-33: dkyus pa nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1193:34b-34: pukka s'i ni zhe sdang rgya //
T02D1193:34b-36: lhag ma rnams ni 'bad pas spang bar bya //
T02D1193:34b-38: rtsa gsum pa ni mchog yin gyi //
T02D1193:34b-39: lhag ma ni rtsa nyi shu rtsa dgu dgos med zer ro //
T02D1193:34b-41: bcu drug cha ni gang yang mi dgos te /
T02D1193:34b-43: bcu drug cha ni nyi shu rtsa dgu las phra
T02D1193:34b-44: ba'i rtsa ni sus kyang mi rtogs shing las gang
T02D1193:35a-3: gzhi'i don gyi bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir zhes 'byung bas so //
T02D1193:35a-4: byang chub sems rgyun zla ba ste //
